WRITING.TITLE: I wish I would have started propecia / fin sooner..
WRITING.TEXT:
Ugh my hair got so much worse over the last six months... like really badly worse. im 26 and my back is almost white i still have some thin hairs there but one year ago it was almost still full. I took some pills one year ago but stopped after 2 days because i freaked about reading all those horror stories and side effects ignoring how millions of propecia takers dont have any sides and are happy... now I started again every day 1.25mg and minox once a day. i really hope it will fill up the back.
http://imgur.com/a/js3wM

what do you mean with "reset"? just cut the dosage down or try the same dosage every other day. or mo wed fr and the others day no pill.

Hello,
great to see you reaching out to users. I am happily using Trading212, I just wish you would add ore new features. You have been adding great new stuff over the past year.
My negatives:
- Yes, some spreads are tight and good, I also like how you change spreads (DAX- from 2 to 1.5) but some others are still too high. - You added fees when putting money in (around 10,5%), when I started using it you didnt have any - Margin: Why did you make it higher? Positions will no be closed at 25%, instead of 10% one year ago. Why did you change that? It would be great if you would communicate such things. - Why do I have to pay 2 Euros when buying stocks like Apple etc.? Didnt quite understood the reasoning. - SWAP Fees are too high in my opinion - No bonus programm for putting money into trading212
